pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Suite of R Functions Implementing Spline Smoothing Techniques // Fit various smoothing spline models. Includes an ssr() function for smoothing spline regression, an nnr() function for nonparametric nonlinear regression, an snr() function for semiparametric nonlinear regression, an slm() function for semiparametric linear mixed-effects models, and an snm() function for semiparametric nonlinear mixed-effects models. See Wang (2011) doi:10.1201/b10954 for an overview.
